channel.title: DSP Add Ons on Syniti Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in DSP Add Ons on Syniti Documentation

item.title: Customize Security with Custom WebApp Groups Using DSP Add-Ons
item.description: Customize Security with Custom WebApp Groups Using DSP Add-Ons An Administrator can use DSP Add-Ons to create custom security for delivered WebApps or custom WebApps. By creating Custom WebApp groups, users can easily customize access for pages depending on any organizational need. For example, WebApp groups could be created for departments, to group pages that are used to perform certain tasks, or to grant access to a page to a limited number of users.

item.title: Group Pages
item.description: Group Pages Use this page to Customize Security with Custom WebApp Groups Using DSP Add-Ons. To access this page: Click DSP Add-Onsin the Navigationpane. Click the Groupsicon. Click the Pagesicon.

item.title: WebApps
item.description: WebApps Use this page to Customize Security with Custom WebApp Groups Using DSP Add-Ons. To access this page, click DSP Add-Onsin the Navigationpane. Field Description WEB APP NAME Displays the name of the WebApp that contains the WebApp group. DATA SOURCE ID Displays the name of the WebAppâ€™s data source, a database. Web App Groups Click to open the Groups page to add and configure WebApp groups.
